actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code with respect to the observance of Memorial Day and Veterans' Day.

summary.text: Changes the observance as a legal public holiday of Memorial Day from the last Monday in May to May 30th and the observance of Veterans Day from the fourth Monday in October to November 11.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code with respect to the observance of Memorial Day and Veterans' Day.
